task: How to Get Slime Out of Hair
steps:
```pddl
(:action gather
    :parameters (?agent - agent ?resource - object)
    :precondition (and (not (selected ?agent ?resource)) (available ?resource))
    :effect (selected ?agent ?resource))

(:action apply
    :parameters (?entity - object ?item - object)
    :precondition (and (prepared ?entity) (available ?item) (not (applied ?entity ?item)))
    :effect (and (applied ?entity ?item) (transformed_state ?entity ?item)))

(:action wash
    :parameters (?a - agent ?target - object ?cleanser - cleanser ?tool - tool)
    :precondition (and (available ?a) (not (cleaned ?target)) (or (inventory ?a ?cleanser) (available ?tool)))
    :effect (and (cleaned ?target) (not (inventory ?a ?cleanser))))

(:action comb
    :parameters (?tool - object ?target - object)
    :precondition (and (prepared ?target) (not (processed ?target)) (is_tool_ready ?tool))
    :effect (processed ?target))

(:action remove
    :parameters (?actor - agent ?target - object ?method - method)
    :precondition (and (available ?actor) (not (removed ?target)) (applicable ?method ?target))
    :effect (and (removed ?target) (apply_effect ?method ?target)))
```

steps:
```pddl
(:action wash
  :parameters (?a - agent ?target - object ?cleanser - cleanser ?tool - tool)
  :precondition (and (available ?a) (not (cleaned ?target)) (or (inventory ?a ?cleanser) (available ?tool)))
  :effect (and (cleaned ?target) (not (inventory ?a ?cleanser))))

(:action shave
  :parameters (?p - agent ?t - object ?b - object)
  :precondition (and (location water out_of_faucet) (applied deodorant ?b))
  :effect (and (clean ?t) (shaved ?b)))

(:action warm_wax
  :parameters (?entity - object ?condition - state ?state - state)
  :precondition (and (not (?condition ?entity)) (?state ?entity))
  :effect (and (?condition ?entity) (not (?state ?entity))))

(:action ApplyStripToSkin
  :parameters (?strip - object ?entity - agent)
  :precondition (peeled ?strip)
  :effect (applied ?strip ?entity))

(:action RubStripOnSkin
  :parameters (?s - object ?p - agent)
  :precondition (and (applied ?s ?p) (not (secured ?s ?p)))
  :effect (secured ?s ?p))

(:action PullStrip
  :parameters (?s - object ?p - agent)
  :precondition (secured ?s ?p)
  :effect (removed ?s ?p))
```

similar_task.task: How to Use Veet on Your Bikini Area
step: Lay out a towel for you to sit on while you wax.
Sit in a comfortable position with your legs spread open.
Rub a Veet wax strip between your hands to warm it up.
Peel the strips apart and set them on the towel wax-side up.
Apply 1 of the strips to your skin.
Rub the strip 3-4 times in the direction of your hair growth.
Hold your skin taut so that itâ€™s easy to pull off the strip.
Grasp the end of the wax strip and rip it off.
Continue applying wax strips until your entire bikini area is hair-free.
Wipe off the excess wax using the cloths provided in the box.

nl_step:
**Task**: How to Wax Your Armpits  
**Steps in Natural Language**:
1. **Wash your armpits** with a gentle cleanser using a clean cloth or sponge to ensure the skin is clean.
2. **Shave any excess hair** in your underarms to prepare the area for waxing.
3. **Warm the wax** until it becomes spreadable and comfortable to apply.
4. **Peel a wax strip** from its packaging, ensuring it is ready for application.
5. **Rub the strip onto your skin** firmly to ensure it adheres properly to the wax.
6. **Quickly pull the strip off** in the opposite direction of hair growth to remove unwanted hair.
